Package de.db.derpate

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.db.derpate.Constants
  • public final class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static attributes to use in fronted as well as in backend, so that a standard is guaranteed.
    Author:
    MichelBlank
    See Also:
    PropertyUtil

      This class contains all static attributes related with Trainees
